channel.title: Rsync on 📕W.'s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Rsync on 📕W.'s Blog

item.title: rsync升级简要步骤
item.description: rsync升级简要步骤 编译环境: redhat 6.5 x86_64 # 安装依赖包 yum install gcc gcc-c++ make automake acl libacl-devel popt-devel # 配置，去除部分特性 ./configure --prefix=/opt/rsync \ --disable-openssl \ --disable-xxhash \ --disable-zstd \ --disable-lz4 # 编译 make && make install # 将生成的二进制文件部署到指定路径下进行测试: /usr/bin/rsync
